titleStmt.title: A dissuasive from revenge in a discourse upon these words, Recompense to no man evil for evil, Rom. 12.17. By Nicolas Stratford, D.D. Dean of S. Asaph.
titleStmt.author: Stratford, Nicholas, 1633-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in S. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
